body.name: CozyLux Terracotta Comforter Set Full Size, 3 Pieces Solid Burnt Orange Breathable Quilted Style Bedding Sets, Rust Luxury Fluffy Soft Microfiber Comforter for All Season(1 Comforter & 2 Pillowcases)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Ultra Soft Fabric: Comforter set is made of premium microfiber, which is super soft, breathable, warm and comfortable. Preferred soft fabric and weightless yet cloud-like filling provides amazing softness and smooth touch feeling. Laying in this cozy comforter, you can enjoy a night of sound sleep for all season.

Exquisite Craftsmanship: We adopt a hidden stitching design on this aesthetic comforter, which not only keeps the beauty of the comforter but keeps the filling where it should be. What's more, the filling will not shift after washing and ensure the comforter lasts for a longer time of use. Our comforter set has four corner ties in the four corners, which can better keep your duvet or comforter from slipping.

What You Can Get: Full comforter set includes 1 comforter (82x86 inches), 2 pillowcases (20x26 inches). Please allow a 1-2 inch actual error. Warm Tips: Since the comforter comes in vacuum-sealed packaging, it is highly recommended to wash it and tumble dry low temperature to puff the comforter before first use. Or you can expose it to sunlight and tap gently, then it will re-fluffed nicely after hours.

Care Instructions: The bed comforter set is easy to care which can save you more time and energy. For year round softness and prevent pilling up, it's highly recommend to wash it in the gentle cycle with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry in low when needed. Do not bleach. Do not iron.

Satisfactory Service: As your satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us. Cozylux is committed to offering you premium products and a caring service. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about our products. We would try our best to solve problems as soon as possible.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Romanticize Your Space Give your bedroom a simple and vibrant look with our finely 3 piece set. The perfect combination of the soft texture and the color palette makes it a great basic that will elevate any room setting. Learn More Exquisite Craftsmanship We adopt a hidden stitching design on this aesthetic comforter, which not only keeps the beauty of the comforter but keeps the filling where it should be, and the filling will not shift after washing. Learn More Make for Cozy Sleep Made from high-quality microfiber, this comforter is perfect for those who need a cloud-like sleep experience. With its contemporary colors and stylish designs, it's ideal for any bedroom decor. Learn More Matching Pillowshams The envelope pillow shams are designed with openings in the back that allow you to easily slip the pillow inside. This simple yet effective design makes them super easy to put on and take off. Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described… Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I love the quality, packaging is nice, very well made, color is exactly as I expected, and oh so soft.Fell in love with this comforter right out of packaging! With the skin sensitivity issues I suffer from this really says ALOT! This is the 5th or 6th comforter we buy this year and the only other can compare comes from this vendor.Washed and dried immediately, no piling or bunching, no pulls or tears in stitching, laid very nicely on my bed, lightweight, yet warm and cozy ( I did not want to get out of bed this morning.)Overall 5 Stars and will definitely order again and again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything you need
reviews.reviewText: This set is soft, warm, and the color is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I rarely ever do reviews. I am normally a lightweight quilt comforter person but decided to try this one. This is by far the most cozy, soft and lightweight comforter ever. I love it so much I immediately purchased another in a different color. I washed it when I got it and none of it bunched up at all as another previous brand very similar did. I have recommended this to my friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty color but a little small
reviews.reviewText: Soft and pretty color. Smaller than it should be for a queen bed, but I just bought a dust ruffle to cover the rest of the bed since the comforter does not cover enough and I didn’t want to return an reorder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most beautiful orange/pumpkin/terracotta color bedding
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this color and the feel of the material against your skin is like butta’ (like it feels so super silky and smooth for a microfiber type cloth)! OMG, it is just what you need when you’re ready to relax and have a nice evening and drift off to sleep! Yes, you definitely need this on your bed in any color you prefer. 💯 Love love love ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light Warm and Fluffy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a king size for a queen size bed because I like for the comforter to cover the sides too.. Takes a few days for the wrinkles to come out but I spray it lightly with wrinkles free and it comes out. GREAT BUY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The purchase of this comforter set is a lesson in “you get what you pay for”. I bought this for my daughter’s bed and she is reasonably happy with it. The terracotta color is nice but the fabric is “chintzy”. I don’t expect this to hold up well at all but for now she likes it well enough to keep it. I would have preferred to spend a little more to get a better quality set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the color of this comforter. Not to mention how soft and warm it is.I'm going to order more colors...
